content: अरुष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not angry. {@--2@} Shining, bright; reddish. {@--3@} Unhurt. {@--4@} Moving, going about (as a horse). --षः {@--1@} The red horse of Agni; a flame. {@--2@} The sun; the day as presided over by the sun. {@--3@} The red storm-cloud. --षी {@--1@} The dawn. {@--2@} A flame. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Bhṛgu and mother of Aurva.
